name: Desiderium (DreamTeam)
description:
DreamTeam proudly presents Desiderium!

 Play as a young woman returning home, reminiscing on her past and an old friend that used to be very dear to her heart in this story based walking sim.

Desiderium builds upon the foundation of games like Life is Strange and Gone home, delivering an emotional experience about friendship and what it's like to lose a close friend as you enter adulthood. 

The game is fully voiced by two amazing voice actors, and was developed as a school project in just 3 months. 

We hope you will find joy in this short and sweet experience, and remember: 

Friends are like seasons, they come and go, and leave something behind. 

Installation:

1. Download zip down below
2. Unzip 
3. Run the .exe named "DesideriumNew"
